biotools.summary: Neighborhood-Aware Variant Impact Predictor (NAVIP) considers all variants within a given protein coding sequence at once when predicting the functional consequences. This is relevant if (independent) sequence variants compensate each other effects.

bioschemas.name: Neighborhood-Aware Variant Impact Predictor
bioschemas.summary: Neighborhood-Aware Variant Impact Predictor (NAVIP) considers all variants within a given protein coding sequence at once when predicting the functional consequences. This is relevant if (independent) sequence variants compensate each other effects.
